title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-2.24 - Educational activities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-2.24 - Educational activities

State Regulations

The costs of educational activities, less tuition and supporting grants, shall be included in the calculation of the basic rate, provided such activities are directly related to patient care services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
86-2.24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
